item.description:
Spend the afternoon Sledding, XC Skiing or Snowshoeing at Wagon Hill Farm in Durham. We'll meet in the parking lot at Wagon Hill Farms then go off to do what you came to do. If anyone has extra sleds or toboggan feel free to bring them along. The forcast for Saturday is for plenty of sunshine and warmer temps which should make for a nice afternoon playing at Wagon hill. Feel free to arrive earlier if you want to and indicate what time you plan to arrive so that others my join you if they'd like. Afterwards @ around 3pm we'll head to a local restaurant for an early late lunch/early dinner.

Wagon Hill Farm Trail Map

More info. on Wagon Hill from Seacoast Online..
item.how_to_find_us: Look for my Black Jeep Cherokee with kayak racks ontop.
item.name: Sledding, XC Skiiing or Snowshoe at Wagon Hill Farm Durham NH
